bug.author: ryanjulian
bug.summary: Asynchronous TensorFlow plotting doesn't work on Mac OSX
bug.description: Asynchronous plotting for TensorFlow works perfectly fine on Linux using threading.Thread, but Mac OS X will not display a window, even if threading.Thread is switched to multiprocessing.Process, which is how it was implemented using Theano. Imported from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ryanjulian/rllab/issues/127>ryanjulian/rllab#127</denchmark-link>
